articles.description: Despite a lot of hype, using drones to get information about the spread of COVID-19 isn’t a great idea.
articles.content:
Featured image: Police personnel in Jaipur during the lockdown as a drone flies above them. Photo: PTI
Since the pandemic began, authorities in New Delhi, Italy, Oman, Connecticut, and China have be… [+15455 chars]

articles.author: Reuters | Posted by: Shankhyaneel Sarkar
articles.title: Pregnant women with Covid-19 show placenta injury in small study - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The study, published in the American Journal of Clinical Pathology, found that 12 of the women, or 80%, had a type of injury that can impair blood flow from the mother to the fetus called vascular malperfusion.
articles.content: The placentas of 16 pregnant women found to have COVID-19 during routine testing at a Chicago hospital all showed evidence of injury, indicating that women infected with coronavirus may need close mo… [+1579 chars]
